title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1932.1 - Regulatory agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1932.1 - Regulatory agreements

State Regulations
(a) The
corporation shall enter into a regulatory agreement with each eligible
applicant who has been accepted, provided that the conditions set forth in the
award have been satisfied. (b) The
regulatory agreement shall provide that the restrictions on the use of the
eligible property are real covenants that shall run with the land until the
termination of the regulatory period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1932.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
